question: Which organization has recently introduced Mobile Science Lab to provide quality education?
explanation: Cipla Foundation has introduced a mobile science lab (MSL) under its corporate social responsibility (CSR) with its Agastya International Foundation. It implemented the Agastya International Foundation. It aims to provide quality education to the students in Sikkim. The initiative also aimed to create awareness of science among children and teachers. The mobile science lab is expected to reach out to 1,400 students across 10 schools in the periphery of the Golden Cross Unit.
